reviews.text: First the good thing about this shabby hotel. It is in the wonderful city of Colmar, France. The town of Colmar is right out of a story book and should not be missed. The Hotel Kempf @ 1 avenue de la République - 68000 Colmar is no way a two star, it is a run down Hotel the makes a NYC subway bathroom look clean. If I was back in Collage backpacking around then maybe this run down place with ripped rags for towels would do. But as a 30 something traveler I would much rather have the room that is clean and without bugs. So for my opinion stay away from the Hotel Kempf
reviews.title: WHAT A DUMP
